titles.title: To make certain modifications with respect to overtime pay and premium pay of customs officers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/25/1997--Introduced. Amends specified Federal law with respect to overtime, premium, and differential pay for customs officers. Revises requirements for the fiscal year cap on the aggregate of overtime pay of a customs officer and for waivers of such limitation. Prohibits payment of overtime or premium pay to any customs officer who has not actually performed work during the time corresponding to such pay. Revises provisions relating to night work differential pay of customs officers.
